title: Tasty Chicken Uppu Kari ( Dozhu Uppukari ) Recipe
content:
Chicken uppu kari or Kozhi Uppu kari is an easy and tasty side dish which can be made in a few mins. It needs just basic ingredients and tastes amazing.

 

Chicken Uppu Kari Recipe

 

Prep time: 5 mins

Cook time: 40 mins

Total time: 45 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

Chicken - 500 grams cut into small pieces

Ginger Garlic Paste - 1 tablespoon + 1 tablespoon

Salt to taste

Chilli Powder - 1 tablespoon

Garam masala powder - 2 teaspoon

Turmeric powder - 1 teaspoon

Coconut Oil - 4 tablespoon

Dry Red Chilli - 5 broken

Curry Leaves - a handful

Onion - 1 chopped

Pepper powder - 1 tablespoon

Coriander leaves - ¼ cup chopped

 

Instructions

Take chicken, salt, ginger-garlic paste, turmeric, chilli and garam masala powder in a pan. Add little water and cook till chicken is done.

Heat coconut oil in a pan, add in curry leaves, dry red chillies and fry for a min.

Add onions and ginger-garlic paste and mix well.

Add chicken and toss well. Cook for 5 to 7 mins.

Add in pepper powder and mix well. Finally, add coriander leaves too.

Serve it.

recommendations.title: Tasty zafrani ( Saffron ) Chicken Pulao Recipe
recommendations.content:
This is a delicious zafrani chicken pulao which is super easy to make and taste amazing. It is great for any party.
Pulao or biryani comes handy when coming to lunch box recipes. This recipe goes perfect with some raita, I served it with onion raita. You can enjoy yourself with any raita

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
